entry.name: sctracenotavail
entry.text: Message trace file was not provided.

entry.name: scnosocketestablished
entry.text: Could not establish IBM Security Access Manager socket

entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager server error

entry.name: sctamsrvapi
entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager server API failure

entry.name: sccodesetutf8
entry.text: init codeset utf8

entry.name: scallocfail
entry.text: Internal allocation failure

entry.name: scldapreturned
entry.text: Returned LDAP DN longer than

entry.name: sctambytes
entry.text: bytes

entry.name: sctamauthsuccess
entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager authentication succeeded

entry.name: sctamauthfail
entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager API authentication failure

entry.name: sctamaznotperm
entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager server az access not permitted

entry.name: sctamazsucceed
entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager authorization succeeded

entry.name: scattrsfail
entry.text: Could not retrieve attributes

entry.name: scazattrssuccess
entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager authorization and attribute retrieval succeeded

entry.name: scazattrspacsuccess
entry.text: IBM Security Access Manager authorization and PAC retrieval and attribute retrieval succeeded

entry.name: scfailevnttimeout
entry.text: Failed to set timeout for IBM Security Access Manager event read
entry.summary: Could not configure a timeout on the access point
entry.description: The access point for communicating on the IBM Security Access Manager client could not be configured with a timeout.

entry.name: scfailreadtamevnt
entry.text: Failed to read IBM Security Access Manager event
entry.summary: Could not read an event on the access point
entry.description: An event could not be read from the access point on the IBM Security Access Manager client.

entry.name: scshutdownevnt
entry.text: Received IBM Security Access Manager shutdown event; exiting
entry.summary: A shutdown event was received on the access point.
entry.description: A shutdown event was received on the access point of the IBM Security Access Manager client. The client will be exited.

entry.name: scunkwnevnt
entry.text: Unknown IBM Security Access Manager event
entry.summary: An unknown event was received on the access point.
entry.description: An unknown event was received on the access point of the IBM Security Access Manager client.

entry.name: scfatalerror
entry.text: Fatal error: Problem setting

entry.name: scdpdirsreaderr
entry.text: Unable to open dpdirs.json for read in %s
entry.description: dpdirs.json is a file containing the mappings for datapower base directory paths. It is mostly used for sidecar processes to recover these values set by the main drouter process.

entry.name: scdpdirsparseerr
entry.text: Unable to parse dpdirs.json in %s
